item.text: Now as Jesus was going out of the temple courts, one of his disciples said to him, “Teacher, look at these tremendous stones and buildings!”
Jesus said to him, “Do you see these great buildings? Not one stone will be left on another. All will be torn down!”
So while he was sitting on the Mount of Olives opposite the temple, Peter, James, John, and Andrew asked him privately,

“<st data-num="3004">Tell</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> will <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">happen</st>? <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> will be the <st data-num="4592" class="">sign</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> are <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4931" class="">take place</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="991">Watch out</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4105" class="">misleads</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> he,’<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="4105" class="">mislead</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> of <st data-num="4171" class="">wars</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="189" class="">rumors</st> of <st data-num="4171" class="">wars</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2360" class="">alarmed</st>. These things <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> is <st data-num="3768">still to come</st>.<n id="1" />
For nation will rise up in arms against nation, and kingdom against kingdom. There will be earthquakes in various places, and there will be famines. These are but the beginning of birth pains.
“You must watch out for yourselves. You will be handed over to councils and beaten in the synagogues. You will stand before governors and kings because of me, as a witness to them.

<st data-num="4412" class="">First</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="2784" class="">preached</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> they <st data-num="71" class="">arrest</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="3860">hand you over for trial</st>,<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="4305" class="">worry</st> about <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> say <st data-num="3739" class="">whatever</st> is <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3738">it</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

<st data-num="80" class="">Brother</st> will <st data-num="3860" class="">hand over</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2289" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> his <st data-num="5043" class="">child</st>. <st data-num="5043" class="">Children</st> will <st data-num="1881" class="">rise</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2289">put to death</st>.
You will be hated by everyone because of my name. But the one who endures to the end will be saved.
“But when you see the abomination of desolation standing where it should not be” (let the reader understand), “then those in Judea must flee to the mountains.

The one <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1430" class="">roof</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1525">go inside</st> to <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.<n id="2" />

The one <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="68" class="">field</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1994">turn back</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="142" class="">get</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>.

<st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to those who <st data-num="2192" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1064" class="">pregnant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> who are <st data-num="2337" class="">nursing</st> their babies <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>!

<st data-num="4336" class="">Pray</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> it may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> in <st data-num="5494" class="">winter</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> in <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> there will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3634 3756">unlike</st> <st data-num="5108" class="">anything</st> that has <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> of the <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="2532">or</st> ever will <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> had <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2856" class="">cut short</st> those <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">one</st> would be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st>, he has <st data-num="2856" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">them</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2856">short</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="2396">Look</st>, <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> is the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ!’</st><n id="2" /> or ‘<st data-num="2396">Look</st>, <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> he is!’ do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> him.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5580" class="">false messiahs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5578" class="">false prophets</st> will <st data-num="1453" class="">appear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">perform</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="635" class="">deceive</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st>, the <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st>.
Be careful! I have told you everything ahead of time.
“But in those days, after that suffering, the sun will be darkened and the moon will not give its light;
the stars will be falling from heaven, and the powers in the heavens will be shaken.
Then everyone will see the Son of Man arriving in the clouds with great power and glory.
Then he will send angels and they will gather his elect from the four winds, from the ends of the earth to the ends of heaven.
“Learn this parable from the fig tree: Whenever its branch becomes tender and puts out its leaves, you know that summer is near.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">happening</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>, right <st data-num="1909">at</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1074" class="">generation</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3928">pass away</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="1096">take place</st>.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.
“But as for that day or hour no one knows it—neither the angels in heaven, nor the Son—except the Father.

<st data-num="991">Watch out</st>! <st data-num="69">Stay alert</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st>.

It is <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="590">going on a journey</st>. He <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1849" class="">in charge</st>, <st data-num="1849" class="">assigning</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1781" class="">commanded</st> the <st data-num="2377" class="">doorkeeper</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1127">stay alert</st>.

<st data-num="1127">Stay alert</st>, <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4219" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">return</st>—<st data-num="2228" class="">whether</st> during <st data-num="3796" class="">evening</st>, at <st data-num="3317" class="">midnight</st>, when the <st data-num="219">rooster crows</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> at <st data-num="4404" class="">dawn</st>—

<st data-num="3361">or else</st> he might <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st> when he <st data-num="2064" class="">returns</st> <st data-num="1810" class="">suddenly</st>.
What I say to you I say to everyone: Stay alert!”
